name: Xero Projects API
description: This is the Xero Projects API

projectIds.description: Search for all projects that match a comma separated list of projectIds

contactID.description: Filter for projects for a specific contact

states.description: Filter for projects in a particular state (INPROGRESS or CLOSED)

page.description: set to 1 by default. The requested number of the page in paged response - Must be a number greater than 0.

pageSize.description: Optional, it is set to 50 by default. The number of items to return per page in a paged response - Must be a number between 1 and 500.

timeout.description: Timeout specifies the number of milliseconds before the request times out. If the request takes longer than timeout, the request will be aborted.

page.description: Set to 1 by default. The requested number of the page in paged response - Must be a number greater than 0.

pageSize.description: Optional, it is set to 50 by default. The number of items to return per page in a paged response - Must be a number between 1 and 500.

projectId.description: Identifier of the project.

contactId.description: Identifier of the contact this project was created for.

currencyCode.description: 3 letter alpha code for the ISO-4217 currency code, e.g. USD, AUD.

minutesLogged.description: A total of minutes logged against all tasks on the Project.

nodes.name: Get Project Users
nodes.description: Retrieves a list of all project users

page.description: set to 1 by default. The requested number of the page in paged response - Must be a number greater than 0.

pageSize.description: Optional, it is set to 50 by default. The number of items to return per page in a paged response - Must be a number between 1 and 500.

page.description: Set to 1 by default. The requested number of the page in paged response - Must be a number greater than 0.

modelState.description: Array of Elements of validation Errors

page.description: Set to 1 by default. The requested number of the page in paged response - Must be a number greater than 0.

pageSize.description: Optional, it is set to 50 by default. The number of items to return per page in a paged response - Must be a number between 1 and 500.

taskIds.description: Search for all tasks that match a comma separated list of taskIds, i.e. GET https://.../tasks?taskIds={taskID},{taskID}

projectId.description: You can specify an individual project by appending the projectId to the endpoint

timeout.description: Timeout specifies the number of milliseconds before the request times out. If the request takes longer than timeout, the request will be aborted.

page.description: Set to 1 by default. The requested number of the page in paged response - Must be a number greater than 0.

pageSize.description: Optional, it is set to 50 by default. The number of items to return per page in a paged response - Must be a number between 1 and 500.

currency.description: 3 letter alpha code for the ISO-4217 currency code, e.g. USD, AUD.

chargeType.description: Can be `TIME`, `FIXED` or `NON_CHARGEABLE`, defines how the task will be charged. Use `TIME` when you want to charge per hour and `FIXED` to charge as a fixed amount. If the task will not be charged use `NON_CHARGEABLE`.

estimateMinutes.description: An estimated time to perform the task

projectId.description: Identifier of the project task belongs to.

totalMinutes.description: Total minutes which have been logged against the task. Logged by assigning a time entry to a task

currency.description: 3 letter alpha code for the ISO-4217 currency code, e.g. USD, AUD.

minutesInvoiced.description: Minutes on this task which have been invoiced.

minutesToBeInvoiced.description: Minutes on this task which have not been invoiced.

fixedMinutes.description: Minutes logged against this task if its charge type is `FIXED`.

nonChargeableMinutes.description: Minutes logged against this task if its charge type is `NON_CHARGEABLE`.

currency.description: 3 letter alpha code for the ISO-4217 currency code, e.g. USD, AUD.
3 letter alpha code for the ISO-4217 currency code, e.g. USD, AUD.

status.description: Status of the task. When a task of ChargeType is `FIXED` and the rate amount is invoiced the status will be set to `INVOICED` and can't be modified. A task with ChargeType of `TIME` or `NON_CHARGEABLE` cannot have a status of `INVOICED`. A `LOCKED` state indicates that the task is currently changing state (for example being invoiced) and can't be modified.

modelState.description: Array of Elements of validation Errors

nodes.name: Create Task
nodes.description: Allows you to create a task

projectId.description: You can create a task on a specified projectId

Idempotency-Key.description: This allows you to safely retry requests without the risk of duplicate processing. 128 character max.

data.description: The task object you are creating

name.description: Name of the task. Max length 100 characters.

currency.description: 3 letter alpha code for the ISO-4217 currency code, e.g. USD, AUD.

chargeType.description: Can be `TIME`, `FIXED` or `NON_CHARGEABLE`, defines how the task will be charged. Use `TIME` when you want to charge per hour and `FIXED` to charge as a fixed amount. If the task will not be charged use `NON_CHARGEABLE`.

estimateMinutes.description: An estimated time to perform the task

estimateMinutes.description: An estimated time to perform the task

projectId.description: Identifier of the project task belongs to.

totalMinutes.description: Total minutes which have been logged against the task. Logged by assigning a time entry to a task

currency.description: 3 letter alpha code for the ISO-4217 currency code, e.g. USD, AUD.

minutesInvoiced.description: Minutes on this task which have been invoiced.

minutesToBeInvoiced.description: Minutes on this task which have not been invoiced.

status.description: Status of the task. When a task of ChargeType is `FIXED` and the rate amount is invoiced the status will be set to `INVOICED` and can't be modified. A task with ChargeType of `TIME` or `NON_CHARGEABLE` cannot have a status of `INVOICED`. A `LOCKED` state indicates that the task is currently changing state (for example being invoiced) and can't be modified.

nodes.name: Get Time Entries
nodes.description: Retrieves all time entries associated with a specific project

userId.description: The xero user identifier of the person who logged time.

taskId.description: Identifier of the task that time entry is logged against.

invoiceId.description: Finds all time entries for this invoice.

contactId.description: Finds all time entries for this contact identifier.

page.description: Set to 1 by default. The requested number of the page in paged response - Must be a number greater than 0.

pageSize.description: Optional, it is set to 50 by default. The number of items to return per page in a paged response - Must be a number between 1 and 500.

states.description: Comma-separated list of states to find. Will find all time entries that are in the status of whatever is specified.

isChargeable.description: Finds all time entries which relate to tasks with the charge type `TIME` or `FIXED`.

dateAfterUtc.description: ISO 8601 UTC date. Finds all time entries on or after this date filtered on the `dateUtc` field.

dateBeforeUtc.description: ISO 8601 UTC date. Finds all time entries on or before this date filtered on the `dateUtc` field.

projectId.description: Identifier of the project, that the task (which the time entry is logged against) belongs to.

timeout.description: Timeout specifies the number of milliseconds before the request times out. If the request takes longer than timeout, the request will be aborted.

page.description: Set to 1 by default. The requested number of the page in paged response - Must be a number greater than 0.

pageSize.description: Optional, it is set to 50 by default. The number of items to return per page in a paged response - Must be a number between 1 and 500.

userId.description: The xero user identifier of the person who logged time.

projectId.description: Identifier of the project, that the task (which the time entry is logged against) belongs to.

taskId.description: Identifier of the task that time entry is logged against.

dateUtc.description: The date time that time entry is logged on. UTC Date Time in ISO-8601 format.

dateEnteredUtc.description: The date time that time entry is created. UTC Date Time in ISO-8601 format. By default it is set to server time.

description.description: A description of the time entry.

status.description: Status of the time entry. By default a time entry is created with status of `ACTIVE`. A `LOCKED` state indicates that the time entry is currently changing state (for example being invoiced). Updates are not allowed when in this state. It will have a status of INVOICED once it is invoiced.

modelState.description: Array of Elements of validation Errors

nodes.name: Create Time Entry
nodes.description: Creates a time entry for a specific project

projectId.description: You can specify an individual project by appending the projectId to the endpoint

Idempotency-Key.description: This allows you to safely retry requests without the risk of duplicate processing. 128 character max.

data.description: The time entry object you are creating

userId.description: The xero user identifier of the person logging the time.

taskId.description: Identifier of the task that time entry is logged against.

dateUtc.description: Date time entry is logged on. UTC Date Time in ISO-8601 format.

duration.description: Number of minutes to be logged. Duration is between 1 and 59940 inclusively.

description.description: An optional description of the time entry, will be set to null if not provided during update.

timeout.description: Timeout specifies the number of milliseconds before the request times out. If the request takes longer than timeout, the request will be aborted.

userId.description: The xero user identifier of the person who logged time.

projectId.description: Identifier of the project, that the task (which the time entry is logged against) belongs to.

taskId.description: Identifier of the task that time entry is logged against.

dateUtc.description: The date time that time entry is logged on. UTC Date Time in ISO-8601 format.

dateEnteredUtc.description: The date time that time entry is created. UTC Date Time in ISO-8601 format. By default it is set to server time.

description.description: A description of the time entry.

status.description: Status of the time entry. By default a time entry is created with status of `ACTIVE`. A `LOCKED` state indicates that the time entry is currently changing state (for example being invoiced). Updates are not allowed when in this state. It will have a status of INVOICED once it is invoiced.

modelState.description: Array of Elements of validation Errors

status.description: Status of the time entry. By default a time entry is created with status of `ACTIVE`. A `LOCKED` state indicates that the time entry is currently changing state (for example being invoiced). Updates are not allowed when in this state. It will have a status of INVOICED once it is invoiced.
